DOC.brief_summary: To determine how the body reacts to a low dose of PF‑06427878 when given in a vein over 30 minutes to healthy, adult, males.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Understand How The Body Reacts To A Low Dose Of PF‑06427878 When Given In A Vein To Healthy, Adult, Males
DOC.criteria: 1. Healthy male subjects between 1855 years of age 2. BMI of 17.530.5 kg/m2 1. History of drug or alcohol abuse within 2 years of screening 2. Subjects without suitable veins for multiple venipuncture/cannulation
